Name: Threat Mitigation Policy for Unrecognized File
Policy: ?Equipment ssso:hasService ?svc.                    ?svc rdf:type ssso:Encryption_at_Rest.                    BIND (?svc AS ?Enable).                    BIND (ssso:TL-0 AS ?Threat_Level).
Description: Enable all Encryption at Rest services on the device, Mitigated Threat Level is TL-0
